title: Banned for no reason :l
body:
Guys I need some help.
I just finished playing a blood moon game and got the screen that my account was permanently banned, please check your email.
I did not receive any email :l
I don't use "third party programs" and i'm never toxic, so why would my account be banned?
 
Summoner: TreesWthSeeds

replies.body: i had the exact same thing happening and i havent got any response from anyone .i even submited a ticket and still nothing

You should have had an email sent to the one you verified for this account, so be sure to check through your spam as well for it. Regardless, you're welcome to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for all the context you might need.
